Duke University held its commencement over the weekend, and students staged a walkout. The rub is that the "elite" university didn't read the room. When they chose their commencement speaker, instead of choosing a spokesman for Hamas and giving them an honorary doctorate in intersectionality, they chose a Jewish man: Jerry Seinfeld.

You may not have noticed, but over the past few months, Jews aren't welcome on college campuses.
title: Watch as these anti-Israel schmucks stage walkout at Duke's graduation over the Jewish speaker: Jerry Seinfeld
